name: Push-up
description: A classic bodyweight exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Squat
description: A fundamental lower body exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Pull-up
description: An upper body exercise that targets the muscles in the back, particularly the latissimus dorsi.

name: Plank
description: A core-strengthening exercise that engages the muscles in the abdomen, lower back, and shoulders.

name: Bicep Curl
description: An isolation exercise for the biceps, focusing on elbow flexion.

name: Deadlift
description: A compound exercise that targets the muscles in the lower body, back, and core.

name: Dumbbell Row
description: An upper body exercise that targets the muscles in the back, particularly the latissimus dorsi.

name: Lunge
description: A lower body exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Tricep Dip
description: An upper body exercise that targets the triceps.

name: Russian Twist
description: A core-strengthening exercise that engages the muscles in the abdomen and obliques.

name: Shoulder Press
description: An upper body exercise that targets the muscles in the shoulders.

name: Calf Raise
description: An isolation exercise for the calf muscles, focusing on ankle plantar flexion.

name: Leg Curl
description: An isolation exercise for the hamstrings, focusing on knee flexion.

name: Leg Extension
description: An isolation exercise for the quadriceps, focusing on knee extension.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: An upper body exercise that targets the muscles in the back, particularly the lat
